resources.string: This is a simple game for two players. Player one, the proposer, gets to decide how to split the movie codes between the two. The role of Player two is to receive the decided amount.

You are given a code for a movie. You can now decide what to do with it. 

If you choose "Keep", you get to keep the code. 
If you choose "Share", you forfeit the code, but two codes will be randomly distributed between all players. 

You are playing with %1$s others.
